questions.question: Do you believe in expanding the Affordable Care Act (ACA)?
questions.description: The Affordable Care Act (ACA) is a health reform law aimed at expanding insurance coverage and reducing healthcare costs.

questions.question: Should the government negotiate prescription drug prices with pharmaceutical companies?
questions.description: Negotiating drug prices means the government would directly discuss and set prices for medications with pharmaceutical companies to lower costs.

choices.value: No, and reduce government involvement further

questions.question: Do you support a single-payer healthcare system (Medicare for All)?
questions.description: A single-payer system means the government provides healthcare for everyone, funded by taxes.

questions.question: How important is it to ensure everyone has access to affordable healthcare?
questions.description: Ensuring access to affordable healthcare means making sure that all individuals can afford medical services.

questions.question: Should the government provide healthcare coverage for undocumented immigrants?
questions.description: This involves offering healthcare services to individuals who are in the country illegally.

choices.value: No, they should not receive coverage
No, and reduce services for immigrants in general
